meanings.definition: A cosmetic product with biologically active ingredients purported to have pharmaceutical effects.
meanings.sent1: I bought a cosmeceutical to help improve my skin's appearance.
meanings.sent2: Many people swear by cosmeceuticals for their skincare routine.
meanings.sent3: The cosmeceutical promised to make me look ten years younger, but I still got carded at the movies.
meanings.sent4: Her cosmeceutical was like a magic potion, transforming her complexion overnight.
meanings.sent5: The cosmeceutical worked wonders, making my wrinkles disappear like they were never there.

meanings.definition: A product that combines cosmetic and pharmaceutical properties.
meanings.sent1: The new cosmeceutical on the market claims to be a game-changer in beauty products.
meanings.sent2: Cosmeceuticals are becoming increasingly popular due to their dual benefits.
meanings.sent3: I joked that the cosmeceutical was so powerful, it could probably cure a cold too!
meanings.sent4: Her cosmeceutical was a secret weapon in her beauty arsenal, giving her a radiant glow.
meanings.sent5: Using the cosmeceutical felt like getting a spa treatment at home, pampering my skin.
